welcome_message_body: Welcome to Florida City, the charming gateway to the beautiful beaches and vibrant culture of Florida. Get ready to soak up the sun, explore our unique local attractions, and make unforgettable memories. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tamiami Airport houses all commercial flights and services.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Tamiami Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Miami International Airport serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Central Terminal
terminals.description: The Central Terminal at Miami International Airport serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Miami International Airport serves international flights for various airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo and freight shipments.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the wifi network for free with a valid email address.
